about_the_game:
Shattered Echoes is a singleplayer arcade-platformer where your only enemy is yourself. Jump, dash and think two steps ahead in hectic attempts to dodge enemies that copy everything you do. Unlock versatile movement abilities and take on challenging arenas where you must outrun your past.

It fuses tight platforming inspired by Celeste with the strategy of retro-arcade games like Pac-Man and Snake, with a hint of the chaos found in so many Bullet-Hells. It features lightning fast rounds perfect for a break, or for hours on end as you try to beat your elusive high scores.


The echoes of your past will copy everything you do, meaning every jump, dash, and dodge just might come back to bite you. Planning ahead and strategizing is just as important as your dexterity and precision.


Complete challenges to unlock versatile movement abilities with a progression system intentionally designed to test your skill & understanding, rather than waste your time.

Explore a diverse array of detailed arenas that offer unique combinations of obstacles and level-specific mechanics, each pushing you to adapt your approach and master each of your traversal capabilities. Endgame content offers difficult challenges to push your skills to the breaking point- you'll have to put everything you've learned together in frenetic, lightning fast gameplay to conquer the toughest trials.
